API name: USGS Earthquake Catalog REST API v1.0
Description: USGS Earthquake Catalog API allows custom searches for earthquake information using a variety of parameters. USGS develop new methods and tools to enable timely, relevant, and useful information about the Earth and its processes, and provides science about hazards, water, energy, minerals, and other natural resources. This service is an implementation of the FDSN Event Web Service Specification.
